Question: Shenzhen Etistar Control System Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Etistar Control System Co., Ltd

Product: CES 2024 Highlights

- Manufacturer of audio and video products
- Certificates: ISO9001, BSCI, HDMI, Bluetooth Licensing, CE, FCC, CB, SAA, TUV
- Products: soundbar, bluetooth speaker, party speaker, Hi-fi speaker, speaker-projector combo, projector
- Exported to 60+ countries including Germany, Finland, Denmark, USA, Mexico, South America, South Africa, Asia
- Mission: customer first, integrity-based, win-win
- Strict quality control from material sourcing to packing
- OEM/ODM welcome
Summary_cn:

- 音频和视频产品制造商

- 产品：音响, 蓝牙音箱, 派对音箱, 高保真音箱, 音箱投影仪组合, 投影仪
- 出口到包括德国、芬兰、丹麦、美国、墨西哥、南美洲、南非、亚洲在内的60多个国家
- 使命：顾客至上，诚信为本，共赢
